refsect1.title: Proposal
refsect1.para: If a class depends on a packages outside the list of packages that come with J2SE, it must list the jar file in cdk/jars that provides this class. This applied to both to requirement at compile time as at runtime. To distinct between these two situations, I propose to have two javadoc tags:
The @build-depends implies a @depends. Each required jar is listed with a separate tag.

refsect1.title: Reason
refsect1.para: At this moment it is very difficult to determine which libraries are needed for certain functionality.
